software.name: Matlab
software.comprehensive_overview: MATLAB is a high-performance language for technical computing. It integrates computation, visualization, and programming in an easy-to-use environment where problems and solutions are expressed in familiar mathematical notation.
software.core_features: Numerical computing, data analysis, algorithm development, model creation, simulation

software.name: GCC (GNU Compiler Collection)
software.comprehensive_overview: GCC is a compiler system produced by the GNU Project supporting various programming languages. It provides support for various programming languages like C, C++, Objective-C, Fortran, etc., and runs on multiple platforms.
software.core_features: Compiling code, optimizing performance, supporting multiple programming languages

software.name: Bioconductor
software.comprehensive_overview: Bioconductor provides tools for the analysis and comprehension of high-throughput genomic data. It is based on R programming language and offers a wide range of packages for bioinformatics and computational biology.
software.core_features: Genomic data analysis, visualization, statistical methods, bioinformatics workflows

software.name: PyTorch
software.comprehensive_overview: PyTorch is an open-source machine learning library for Python, used for applications such as natural language processing and computer vision. It provides a flexible framework for building dynamic neural networks.
software.core_features: Deep learning, neural networks, GPU acceleration, dynamic computation graphs

software.name: GROMACS
software.comprehensive_overview: GROMACS is a versatile package for molecular dynamics simulations. It is designed for simulations of proteins, lipids, and nucleic acids.
software.core_features: Molecular dynamics simulations, energy minimization, trajectory analysis, force field support
